text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.title: Axes Are Weapons
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.en: Enable Fire Aspect for Axes (via Anvil)
Enable modded Sword Enchantments for Axes (via Anvil)
Enable the above in the Enchanting Table too
Otherwise books have to be used
Enable Damage Enchantments for Axes in the Enchanting Table

Namely: Sharpness, Smite and Bane of the Bane of Arthropods
(These can always be added via books)

Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled

Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled

Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled

Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.fa:
Break cobwebs as fast as a Sword
Note this will also make them drop String
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.pi: Enable all general options for Pickaxes too
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.sh: Enable all general options for Shovels too
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.ho: Enable all general options for Hoes too
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.ra:
Enable all general options for Bows/Crossbows too
(minus Cobweb breaking)
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.en:
If you don't want to make Bows/Crossbows weapons
but still want your favorite Looting enchantment
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.we:
Additional (enchantable) items that should be weapons
e.g. minecraft:fishing_rod
Note that not all general options may apply
